title: Roast crispy pork belly with egg fried rice
description: Ken Hom’s classic crispy pork takes time to prepare but demands no great skill. Egg fried rice is a great way to use up leftover rice.
ingredients: 1.5 kg/3lb 5oz boneless pork belly, with rind
400g/14oz long-grain rice, cooked according to the packet instructions, drained and chilled
½ tsp freshly ground black pepper
